titleStmt.title: To the whole flock of God everywhere, the church of the first-born written in heaven, and to every member thereof, whose redeemer is the holy one of Israel grace, mercy, peace, truth and love from the God of peace and love be multiplied amongst you, and to you all, amen.
titleStmt.author: Rigge, Ambrose, 1634-1704.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
